name: FILM 194S
title: Special Topics Seminar
description: Intensive research and writing on a changing topic chosen to demonstrate critical mastery in a specific area of film and digital media studies, for example, film adaptations and their literary sources, documentary/reality shows, or networked new media texts. May be repeated for credit.

pre_req_data.text: Prerequisite(s): FILM 120. Enrollment restricted to senior film and digital media majors.
